t: Amazon, JP Morgan, Berkshire Hathaway health-care venture named: Haven
s: March 6, 2019 - Haven was formed by the leaders of Amazon, Berkshire Hathaway, and JPMorgan Chase because they have been frustrated by the quality, service, and high costs that their employees and families have experienced in the U.S. health system.

t: Amazon, Berkshire, JPMorgan healthcare company to be called Haven | Fox Business

t: Buffett's Berkshire unveils $861 million Amazon stake | Reuters
s: May 15, 2019 - Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc said it owned $860.6 million (£670.1 million) of Amazon.com Inc shares at the end of March, after the billionaire admitted to underestimating the online retailer and its Chief Executive Jeff Bezos.

t: Berkshire Blanket & Home Co. – Berkshire Blanket Inc
s: Born from a single fleece blanket made in 1993, we've grown quite a bit, but the important things have never changed. We have been and always will be committed to keeping you and your family cozy. Thank you for letting us be a part of your home for the past 30 years - and for many more to come.
